inputSpec.name: vcfs
inputSpec.label: VCFs
inputSpec.help: Two or more gzipped VCFs for integration, which must be specified in Callset_Table txt file

inputSpec.name: beds
inputSpec.label: BEDs
inputSpec.help: Two or more BED files describing not callable regions for integration, which must be specified in Callset_Table txt file

inputSpec.name: filtbeds
inputSpec.label: BEDs
inputSpec.help: One or more BED files describing regions to be excluded from one or more callset's callable regions, which must be specified as column names at the end of the Callset_Table txt file

inputSpec.name: annotations
inputSpec.label: Annotation Files
inputSpec.help: Annotations to use from each callset for the one-class filtering model used for integration, which must be specified in Callset_Table txt file

inputSpec.name: callsettable
inputSpec.label: Callset_Table
inputSpec.help: Tab-delimited text file containing columns Platform, Dataset, Callset, vcfAll, callableBed, and annotationsFile.

inputSpec.name: ref
inputSpec.label: Reference tar.gz with genome.fa,genome.fa.fai, and genome.dict
inputSpec.help: Reference genome fasta, index, and dict in tar.gz

inputSpec.name: rtgsdf
inputSpec.label: RTG Reference sdf tar.gz with rtgsdf subdir
inputSpec.help: RTG Reference genome sdf in tar.gz with rtgsdf subdir

inputSpec.name: chrom
inputSpec.label: Chromosome (enter chromosome number for a specific chromosome, 'all' for all chromosomes, or 'allbutY' for all female chromosomes)
inputSpec.help: The chromosome to output vcf and bed files for (enter chromosome number for a specific chromosome, 'all' for all chromosomes, or 'allbutY' for all female chromosomes).

inputSpec.name: refn
inputSpec.label: Reference N bed file
inputSpec.help: Bed file describing regions with N in reference.

inputSpec.name: prefix
inputSpec.label: Output prefix
inputSpec.help: The prefix to use when naming the output files (they will be called prefix_xxx.vcf.gz, prefix_xxx.vcf.gz.tbi, prefix_xxx.bed).

outputSpec.name: vcfallnofiltgz
outputSpec.label: All Integrated Variants before filtering arbitration
outputSpec.help: All integrated variants before filtering arbitration, including uncertain variants as filtered rows.

outputSpec.name: vcfallnofilttbi
outputSpec.label: All Integrated Variants before filtering arbitration index
outputSpec.help: Index for All integrated variants before filtering arbitration, including uncertain variants as filtered rows

outputSpec.name: vcfanngz
outputSpec.label: All Variants Annotated with beds
outputSpec.help: All variants with genotypes from each callset and annotated with bed files.

outputSpec.name: vcfanntbi
outputSpec.label: All Integrated Annotated with beds index
outputSpec.help: Index for All variants with genotypes from each callset and annotated with bed files

outputSpec.name: vcfallgz
outputSpec.label: All Integrated Variants
outputSpec.help: All integrated variants, including uncertain variants as filtered rows.

outputSpec.name: vcfalltbi
outputSpec.label: All Integrated Variants index
outputSpec.help: Index for All integrated variants, including uncertain variants as filtered rows

outputSpec.name: vcfhighconf2techtbi
outputSpec.label: High-confidence Integrated Variants in 2 technologies index
outputSpec.help: Index for High-confidence integrated variants in 2 technologies

outputSpec.name: bed1
outputSpec.label: High-confidence BED 1 tech
outputSpec.help: High-confidence BED file with at least 1 technology callable

outputSpec.name: bed2
outputSpec.label: High-confidence BED 2 tech
outputSpec.help: High-confidence BED file with at least 2 technologies callable

outputSpec.name: bedcallablegt0
outputSpec.label: BED Callable 1 tech
outputSpec.help: BED file with at least 1 technology callable

outputSpec.name: bedcallableall
outputSpec.label: BED callable
outputSpec.help: BED file listing number of technologies callable

outputSpec.name: bedfilteredsites
outputSpec.label: Filtered sites BED
outputSpec.help: BED file with 50bp regions around not-high-confidence sites

outputSpec.name: bedindivfilteredsites
outputSpec.label: Individual callset Filtered sites BEDs
outputSpec.help: All individual callsets' BED files with 50bp regions around not-high-confidence sites
